auth/claims-too-large: Request size exceeds the maximum allowed size of 1 Megabyte.

auth/invalid-hash-algorithm: HASH algorithm is not cryptography compatible.
auth/invalid-hash-derived-key-length: HASH derived key length is invalid.

auth/invalid-last-sign-in-time: Last sign-in time must be a valid UTC date.
auth/invalid-page-token: Next URL provided in the request is invalid.
auth/invalid-password: Password is invalid, must be at least 6 characters long.
auth/invalid-session-cookie-duration: Session COOKIE duration must be a valid number in milliseconds, between 5 minutes and 2 weeks.
auth/invalid-uid: Provided identifier must have a maximum of 128 characters.
auth/invalid-user-import: User record to import is invalid.
auth/maximum-user-count-exceeded: Maximum number of users allowed to import has been exceeded.
auth/missing-hash-algorithm: HASH generation algorithm and its parameters must be provided to import users.
auth/missing-uid: Identifier is required for the current operation.
auth/reserved-claims: One or more custom properties provided reserved words used.
auth/uid-alread-exists: Provided identifier is already in use.
auth/email-already-exists: Provided email address is already in use.
auth/phone-number-already-exists: Provided phone number is already in use.
auth/insufficient-permission: Used credential does not have access to the requested resource.
auth/internal-error: Authentication server encountered an unexpected error while trying to process the request.
auth/missing-email: You must enter an email address.
